spell._comment: Names of spells which can be cast

zap.name: Zap
zap.description: Deal 10 damage to a random enemy.

ice_bolt.name: Ice Bolt
ice_bolt.description: Deal 3 damage. 50% chance to freeze for 2 turns.

earthquake.name: Earthquake
earthquake.description: Deal 5 damage to each enemy. 50% chance for each to get stunned.

focus.name: Focus
focus.description: For the next 6 turns, spells deal 50% extra damage.

phase.name: Phase
phase.description: Become immune to damage next turn.

fire_cleanse.name: Fire Cleanse
fire_cleanse.description: Destroy all fire gems and deal 3 damage for each.

fountain_of_youth.name: Fountain of Youth
fountain_of_youth.description: Destroy all blue gems and heal 2 for each.

fertilise.name: Fertilise
fertilise.description: Replace all green gems with crystal gems.

poison_dart.name: Precise Dart
poison_dart.description: Deal 5 damage. If the enemy is at full health deal 10 instead.

induce_explosion.name: Induce Explosion
induce_explosion.description: Deal 5 damage. If this kills the enemy, deal 10 damage to all other enemies.

channel.name: Mystic Channel
channel.description: If you cast a spell next turn, copy it two extra times.

whispers_in_the_wind.name: Whispers in the Wind
whispers_in_the_wind.description: Destroy all your air gems, and cast three of your spells randomly.

drain_life.name: Drain Life
drain_life.description: Deal 5 damage. If this kills the enemy, gain 8 life.

evaporate.name: Evaporate
evaporate.description: Convert your water gems into air gems.

cleanse.name: Cleanse
cleanse.description: Heal for 3 and clear the grid.

forest_fire.name: Forest Fire
forest_fire.description: Turn your earth gems into fire gems.

charge_bolt.name: Charge Bolt
charge_bolt.description: Deal 3 damage plus 3 more for each other time you cast this spell this round.

tutorial.1: Oh, heavens! There is a goblin in the path. We'd better take care of it...
tutorial.2: Draw chains of the same colour to deal damage.
tutorial.5: Every few turns the enemies will attack you. Make sure you kill them before they kill you!
tutorial.7: You've learnt a new spell! Tap it to find out what it does.
tutorial.9: That seems pretty good! You should equip it so you can use it in battle. Drag it to an empty slot.
tutorial.10: Now you're ready for the next challenge! Head back to the map to continue your journey...
tutorial.101: This might be tricky! You'd better use your new spell.
tutorial.102: Draw the spell in any orientation to cast it!
tutorial.103: Nice work! You have many spells to learn yet, and many enemies to defeat. Good luck!
